trans-unit.source: The instance context that has finished processing.
Represents the method that is called when an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> 개체가 처리를 마칠 때 호출되는 메서드를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Use an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> to notify the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object has finished processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 런타임에 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 개체가 처리를 마쳤음을 알리려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback>을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> has finished its work, WCF calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> once again.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 개체 런타임에 알립니다 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback> 해당 작업, WCF 호출 완료 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 다시 한 번입니다.

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: 이 주기는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>이 `true`를 반환하고 컨텍스트가 닫힌 다음 주기가 다시 시작될 때까지 계속됩니다.
